| HistoryText             = The Chosen Eight of Fate were part of a coalition of alien races intent on creating a race of super beings to protect them. To this end the Chosen Eight were empowered by gems of the [[Lifestone Tree]] that was built as part of the collaboration between the species.{{r|Thunderbolts #45}}

Six members have been shown. It is know the group had a [[Shi'ar]], a [[Badoon]], a [[Kree]] (Ajes'ha), and a [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrull]] as members. One other member bears a striking similarity to the [[Cabal of Scriers]] and another one resembles the [[Deviants (Homo descendus)|Earth Deviant]] [[Brother Tode]].{{r|Thunderbolts #46}}

| Equipment               =

| Notes                   = * It is possible that the Skrull member is [[Krimonn (Earth-616)|Krimonn]], who was transformed into the Lifestone known as the [[Power Prism]] as punishment for his plot to overthrow [[Dorrek VII (Earth-616)|Emperor Dorrek VII]].
